item.description:
Traveling with Your Camera Gear – Ron Rosenstock

 

Internationally known photographer and photo tour leader, Ron Rosenstock, will show some of his work and share his experience and tips from forty years of travel photography. Starting with just what you need to bring, how to pack your gear, the easiest way of getting through airport security, stowing your gear on board, and knowing what to expect on arrival in a foreign country.

Ron’s presentation will include photos from favorite destinations, such as Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Morocco, Bhutan, USA, and others.

 

Book Signing:  Meet with Ron after his presentation for a signing of his photography books.

 

Public Invited: $5 per person. Seating is limited.

 

March 8, 2012    7:30 pm to  9:30 pm   Doors open at 7 pm

 

Holden Senior Center

1130 Main St.

Holden, MA

 

Sponsored by  Seven Hills Camera Club   www.meetup.com/sevenhillscameraclub

and the Worcester Alliance of Photographers   www.meetup.com/photo22

For more information: photography_2@hotmail.com

 

Ron’s photographs may be seen at his one-person show, “Hymn to the Earth” showing at the Worcester Art Museum, December 15, 2011 through March 18, 2012.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the big room to the right as you enter the building!

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP
